EmailTemplate.name: Credit Check Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Credit Check Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName},
The account {!Opportunity.Account} you're creating this opportunity for doesn't have a credit check against it. Before you can proceed with this opportunity, please submit a new credit check request.
{!Opportunity.Account} needs to have a credit check run, even if buying through an agency.
Thank You,
Sales Ops
